| Job           | security-guard | manager            | mechanic     | software-developer | pilot     | analyst     | broker (not mentioned) is not a job here so it should be replaced by the remaining job:  The person eating broccoli is on the far right and the person driving the car is on the far left. Therefore the jobs from left to right are: security-guard, manager, mechanic, software-developer, pilot, analyst, broker is not in the list of jobs so the correct answer should be one of the mentioned job that has not been used which will be replaced by "broker" with "broker" being a non valid job. The 7 different types of job are: analyst, designer, manager, mechanic, pilot, security-guard, software-developer and since there is no broker but we have a designer that was not placed in the list so it should be placed as: car, security-guard | bike, designer     | quad-bike, mechanic | bus, software-developer | tram, pilot  | skateboard, analyst | broccoli, manager |

Since helicopter was not used we will use it for the position that was mentioned as having a job of pilot which is on position 5 so position 5 should be changed from "tram" to "helicopter". Therefore from left to right are: car, bike, quad-bike, bus, helicopter, skateboard, tram|
